Description :
A century after the disaster, Mars plunged into chaos, the power of the planet was divided between conservative and Abundance by young guild Technomancers, spoon the magical power of the artifacts. Both camps control the supply of the most valuable resource on the planet - water.
The main character - a talented and cynical scoundrel named Roy caught by one of the parties, and landed in jail. The authors promise a generous set of quests, dynamic and tactical combat, an elaborate system of "craft" and interesting characters.
